author: Special Correspondent
text:
Neyveli Lignite Corporation Ltd., a Navratna PSU under the Ministry of Coal, paid an interim dividend of Rs.226.49 crore for the financial year 2015-16 to the Central Government.

The total outgo to the company on its paid up capital of Rs.1677.71 crore is Rs.251.66 crore.

Of this, the interim dividend accrued from the company’s shares, 90 per cent of which is held by the Government of India.

Sarat Kumar Acharya, Chairman and Managing Director of NLC Ltd., handed over the cheque for Rs.226.49 crore to Piyush Goyal, Union Minister of State with Independent Charge for Power, Coal and New & Renewable Energy in New Delhi.
title: NLC pays interim dividend of Rs.226.49 crore to Centre
